description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. I am the Great Queen of Towervania. I require the bravest and most gallant  knights to expand my kingdom! Play the single player campaign or battle against others in an online world. Construct the highest towers to rule the land!
description.short: I am the Great Queen of Towervania. I require the bravest and most gallant  knights to expand my kingdom! Play the single player campaign or battle against others in an online world. Construct the highest towers to rule the land!
